articles.title: When Bigger Stops Being Better
articles.thesis: Exploring the inflection point where model size becomes counterproductive
articles.summary: As AI models grow exponentially, we're hitting diminishing returns. This piece explores why smaller, specialized models might be the future of enterprise AI.

articles.title: AI Infrastructure at an Open Source Inflection Point
articles.thesis: The open source AI ecosystem is reaching a critical mass
articles.summary: Open source AI tools are maturing rapidly, creating new opportunities for enterprise adoption and innovation.

articles.title: Small Language Models and the Service Layer Reality
articles.thesis: SLMs are becoming the practical choice for production systems
articles.summary: Small Language Models are proving more practical than their larger counterparts for real-world enterprise applications.

articles.title: Stress-Testing Blockchain and AI at Global Scale
articles.thesis: Real-world testing reveals the limits and potential of combined technologies
articles.summary: Lessons learned from deploying AI and blockchain solutions at enterprise scale across global markets.

articles.title: Shipping Real Value in the AI Champagne Era
articles.thesis: Moving beyond hype to deliver tangible business outcomes
articles.summary: How to cut through AI hype and focus on solutions that deliver measurable business impact.

articles.title: Research, but make it deep
articles.thesis: The importance of rigorous research in AI development
articles.summary: Why deep, methodical research is crucial for building reliable AI systems in enterprise environments.

articles.title: Are Today's AI Agents Actually Agentic?
articles.thesis: Examining the gap between AI agent marketing and reality
articles.summary: A critical look at whether current AI agents truly exhibit autonomous behavior or are just sophisticated automation.

articles.title: AI Agents in Finance and Crypto
articles.thesis: Exploring autonomous agents in financial markets
articles.summary: The first exploration of how AI agents are being deployed in financial services and cryptocurrency markets.
